text: I'm excited to announce that our first
Lang chain Academy course introduction
to Lang graph is now
available at Lang chain we aim to make
it as easy as possible to build llm
applications one type of llm application
that you can build is an agent you can
create agents by allowing an llm to
determine the control flow of an
application there's a lot of excitement
around building agents because they can
automate a wide range of tasks that
previously were impossible in practice
though it's incredibly difficult to
build systems that reliably execute on
these tasks as we've worked with our
users to put agents into production
we've learned that more control is often
necessary you might need an agent to
always call a specific tool first or to
use different prompts based on its state
to tackle this problem we've built Lang
graph a framework for building agentic
and multi-agent applications separate
from the Lang chain package Lang 's Core
Design philosophy is to help developers
add better precision and more control
into agentic workflows making them
suitable for the complexity of Real
World Systems while there's a lot of
high-minded talk about agents and what
they can do we really want to ground
this course in practicality we'll teach
you how to use langra to build agents
that can reliably handle different types
of day-to-day tasks that you actually
encounter in your work by end of this
course you'll have create your own AI
assistant in langra that can solve real
problem problem s for you like
automating tedious parts of your daily
work or helping with strategic decision
making in module one we'll start the
fundamentals of Agents introduce Lang
graph and build a few General agent
architectures in module two we'll show
how to work with messages to exchange
information within your agent and we'll
also show how to use memory to save your
agent's internal state in module three
we'll cover how to add human in the loop
to approve specific actions or review
your agent's work and in module 4 we'll
build this all into research assistant
that can prod customizable knowledge
outputs like reports or wikis or
summaries using various types of tools
you give it such as web search or
documents that are relevant to your
application we'll build this all using
line grph features for parallelization
and human review We believe that we have
a unique approach to building agents one
that lets you put your company specific
workflow at the center and gives you the
control needed to ship that to
production I hope that you take this
course and gain the skills to master
Lang graph for creating powerful
production ready L applications
[Music]
